block.minecraft.nether_portal.name: Nether Portal
advancements.enigmatica.husbandry.tame_a: Tame every animal there is to tame!
effect.sushigocrafting.acquired_taste.de: Eating while this effect is active will give extra food.
effect.sushigocrafting.small_bites.descr: Eating while this effect is active will give a small chance to not consume the item.
effect.sushigocrafting.steady_hands.desc: Using a cutting board while this effect is active will give extra weights in your ingredients.
effect.ars_nouveau.recovery.description: Increases healing received from other sources.
effect.ars_nouveau.blasting.description: Causes the target to explode violently when the effect ends.
effect.ars_nouveau.bounce.description: Causes the target to bounce as if walking on Slime Blocks.
effect.ars_nouveau.gravity.description: Causes flying mobs to plummet to the ground.
effect.ars_nouveau.hex.description: Increase any damage taken by a small amount while afflicted with Poison, Wither, or Fire. Additionally, hex cuts the rate of Mana Regeneration and healing in half.
effect.ars_nouveau.magic_find.descriptio: Causes Magical Creatures to glow and Amethyst to be revealed through blocks.
effect.ars_nouveau.shocked.description: Applied when struck by the Glyph of Lightning. Causes all additional lightning damage to deal bonus damage.
effect.ars_nouveau.spell_damage.descript: Increases damage caused by Ars Nouveau's Spells.
effect.occultism.third_eye.description: Grants the ability to see Otherstone and Otherworld Trees in their true form, allowing them to be harvested.
effect.occultism.dragon_greed.descriptio: The Dragon familiar provides increased experience gain to their master
effect.occultism.mummy_dodge.description: The Mummy familiar is a martial arts expert and fights to protect their master.
effect.occultism.beaver_harvest.descript: The Beaver familiar provides increased woodcutting speed to their masters and harvests nearby trees when they grow from a sapling.
effect.occultism.double_jump.description: Grants the ability to jump again while in the air.
effect.occultism.bat_lifesteal.descripti: Steals the life force from creatures attacked by the afflicted, healing the afflicted.
